Change a number value using a slider: Change a number value using a slider
The minimum value of the slider.
The maximum value of the slider.
Value to be added or subtracted on each: Value to be added or subtracted on each step the slider makes. Must be greater than zero, and max - min should be evenly divisible by the step value.
By default tooltip shows current value. Choose 'Custom' to create your own template.
When enabled tooltip is always visible t: When enabled tooltip is always visible to the user
The number of marker ticks that appear a: The number of marker ticks that appear along the slider’s track. (Visible when larger than 0)
Number of decimal places for marker valu: Number of decimal places for marker values
The orientation of the slider. If ‘Verti: The orientation of the slider. If ‘Vertical’, make sure to set the either the height of the parent or slider to a fixed height.
